titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on the production of anti-cancer drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/25/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on (S)-N-((5-(2-(2-amino- 4,6,7,8-tetra-hydro-4-oxo-1H-pyrimido(5,4-b) (1,4)thiazin-6-yl)ethyl)- 2-thieny-l)carbonyl)-L-glutamic acid diethyl ester (anti-cancer drug).
